author: Saheli Roy Choudhury
title: Coronavirus live updates: China calls for global policy coordination, Italy death toll above 8,000
description: Global cases of infection rose to nearly 530,000 and close to 24,000 people have died, according to data compiled by Johns Hopkins University.
content:
This is a live blog. Please check back for updates.
  • Global cases: More than 529,500
  • Global deaths: At least 23,900
  • U.S. cases: At least 83,800
  • U.S. deaths: At least 1,200
The data above was compiled by Johns Hopkins U… [+5695 chars]
